metadata.name: Ripple Sphere 1
metadata.description: The first in my series of 1 of 1 NFT's that encompass a culmination of skills that I have diligently practiced throughout my life.   I have been shooting high resolution video and time lapse for 20 years now and over the past few years have started to study and master 3D animation.   I created the OrbZen series with some of my most hallucinogenic, ultra high resolution, slow motion video, of a reflection of fall aspen leaves atop a flowing creek in Colorado.  I then spent six months figuring out the formula for merging this video in its present form with the magic of 3D animation. The result led to an exceptionally tranquil Zen artwork experience. My goal is to create works of art that are so calming to look at that they induce a sense of illumination in its audience.
